| icon              = poe2 stiletto_icon.png
| description       = Stilettos are similar to daggers but differ subtly in their shape and function. Made for penetrating armor, stilettos feature a stiff piercing blade that resembles a shrunken estoc's. Though they are not powerful weapons, they can strike deadly blows rapidly against a lightly-armored opponent.
